reviews.review_msg: Great prof, easily top 3! Had him Crim 413 and 417 and must say he was one of the best lecturers and overall great individual! The exams consist of broad questions that if you went to lecture, you would know roughly what would be asked. Super helpful during office hours and very encouraging. Just don't be rude to him, and everything will be A Ok.
Definitely did not like this class at all. AMybe it was the content, maybe it was the prof.

conflict in schools, aka RJ in schools.. amazingly interesting class taught by.  a prof that loves and writes on the subject. journals are like 315, so pretty simple. presentation were very interesting... overall i really enjoyed this class, and brenda knows a lot of this subject. Like usual brenda is pretty laid back, and her marking is the same.
